page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: Edington Fair & Edington Festival As well as the usual fetes, concerts, festivals,etc.,there are two Annual events which are locally important. EDINGTON FAIR is always the second Saturday in July and has been for over 100 yrs.Originally it was attended by the nobility and wealthy of Wiltshire and was held in the church grounds.It has changed its venue many times and is now a more local event,but still retains the same purpose -to raise cash to maintain the church.EDINGTON FESTIVAL, only 30 yrs old, is known throughout England.During a week in August, some of the best choristers and organists in the country perform at least three services a day in the church.Enthusiasts of church music take their holidays in the village to attend.One service each year is always broadcasted on national radio.
